fields.text: Welcome to The League, San Francisco’s premier selective dating app matching you with like-minded singles.
If you are an existing League member, press [INDEX].
If you are new to The League or want to become a member, press [INDEX].
To update your profile or preferences, press [INDEX].
To review your current matches and messages, press [INDEX].
For information on membership plans and pricing, press [INDEX].
For an overview of app features and the matchmaking process, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a team member who will help you update your profile.
One moment please—we’ll connect you with support for your matches.
Thank you—please hold while we connect you to someone who can discuss membership options.
Hang tight—we’re connecting you with a specialist to explain how The League matches you.
